item.title: You’ll See Why I Was So Glad I Took This Home — Would You Have Done the Same?
item.description: A personal, straightforward story explaining the situation, the decision-making process, and why bringing this item home felt like the right choice, shared in a thoughtful and relatable way.

media:content.media:description: A personal, straightforward story explaining the situation, the decision-making process, and why bringing this item home felt like the right choice, shared in a thoughtful and relatable way.

item.title: So I Found A Diamond Ring By The Thames
item.description: A surprising discovery along the River Thames reveals a diamond ring, sharing the moment it was found, its possible history, and the excitement of unearthing such a rare treasure. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Weekend Full Of Rare Finds on the Thames!
item.description: Join a weekend mudlarking adventure along the River Thames, uncovering rare and fascinating finds while exploring the history hidden beneath the riverbank.

item.title: My Best Mudlarking Finds of the Year on the River Thames
item.description: A roundup of the most memorable mudlarking discoveries from the River Thames this year, showcasing historic objects, unexpected finds, and the stories they reveal. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: I’ll Never Forget What We Found While Bottle Digging in Chicago
item.description: Join us as we explore a bottle digging adventure in Chicago, uncovering surprising and memorable finds while learning about the history behind each discovery. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Very Excited About Finding A 19-Century Pewter Mug
item.description: Explore the discovery of a 19th-century pewter mug, uncovering its history, craftsmanship, and why this antique find is so exciting.

item.title: A Nuclear Artifact Found at Dead Horse Bay Mudlarking NYC
item.description: A rare nuclear artifact has been found at Dead Horse Bay in NYC, uncovering a surprising piece of history during a mudlarking exploration.

item.title: Exploring Ancient Thames Pier: Here's What I Found
item.description: A look at the discoveries made while exploring a historic Thames pier, uncovering artifacts and remnants that reveal stories of the past.

item.title: What a Pewter Syringe Reveals About 19th-Century Medicine
item.description: A look at a pewter syringe and what it reveals about medical practices in the 19th century, highlighting historical context, craftsmanship, and healthcare evolution.

item.title: Fascinating Foreshore Finds Reveal a Remarkable History
item.description: A look at fascinating objects uncovered along the foreshore, revealing insights into the area’s past and the stories these historical discoveries tell.

item.title: Strange Find on a Secret Shore—What Is It?
item.description: An intriguing look at a strange object found on a secluded shoreline, exploring its possible origins and the curiosity it sparked among those who discovered it.

item.title: I Never Expected to Find This Gem After 100 Years in the Mud
item.description: An incredible find emerges after spending a century buried in mud, offering a glimpse into history and the story behind this long-lost item.

item.title: I Found A Part Of A Wooden Ship While Mudlarking
item.description: A look at a remarkable wooden fragment uncovered while mudlarking, exploring its features and the history it may hint at.

item.title: Could We Mudlark in Antarctica Someday?
item.description: A curious look at whether mudlarking could ever be possible in Antarctica, exploring the environment, rules, and scientific considerations that shape the idea.

item.title: Unbelievable What We Found in the River!
item.description: A calm, factual look at an unexpected item found during a river search, detailing how it was uncovered and what made the discovery noteworthy without exaggeration.

item.title: Thames Treasure Hunt Pays Off! One Puzzling Discovery!
item.description: A thrilling day of treasure hunting along the Thames leads to a puzzling and exciting discovery, highlighting the finds and the joy of uncovering hidden history.

item.title: Secrets Beneath the Surface: Mysterious Finds Magnet Fishing!
item.description: Exploring hidden treasures uncovered while magnet fishing, highlighting surprising discoveries and the stories behind objects pulled from beneath the water’s surface.

item.title: Stormy skies, crashing waves, and treasures uncovered…
item.description: A dramatic look at stormy coastal conditions uncovering unexpected treasures, highlighting the power of nature and the fascinating finds revealed along the shore.

item.title: Hundreds of Live Rounds! A Mudlarking Mystery
item.description: Exploring a mudlarking discovery of hundreds of live rounds, examining the historical context and the surprising story behind the find.

item.title: Exploring the River’s Secrets!
item.description: A journey along the river reveals fascinating discoveries, wildlife, and hidden spots, capturing the excitement and curiosity of exploring nature up close.
